name: Time-Restricted Eating (Circadian)
description: Eating aligned with circadian rhythm â€” typically finishing food 3+ hours before sleep and emphasizing earlier eating window. Distinct from caloric restriction. Satchin Panda's research shows circadian-aligned eating improves metabolic health independent of calorie reduction.

dosage.standard: 10-12 hour eating window, finish 3hr before bed
dosage.notes: Satchin Panda protocol: 10hr window is sweet spot for most. Earlier eating preferred (insulin sensitivity higher in AM). Even without calorie change, metabolic benefits observed. Track with myCircadianClock app.

keyFindings: 10hr TRE improved metabolic syndrome markers without calorie counting (Panda lab, Cell Metabolism)
Firefighters on 10hr TRE: improved blood pressure, glucose, and LDL (RCT)
Circadian misalignment (eating late) increases cancer risk independent of calories
